long_description: The Ruffwear Omnijore joring system enables all-season dog-pulling activity, such as skijoring, mountainboard-joring, skatejoring, bikejoring or canicross. Complete system combines a dog harness, human hipbelt and towline that work together to maximize comfort and enjoyment for you and your dog. 5-point dog harness is padded for comfort and easily adjustable for a customized fit. Human hipbelt features zippered pocket, water bottle holster and a tow bridle that allows 180deg of tow direction for use in multiple joring activities. Removable leg loops help keep the hipbelt in place. Dog harness is available in 3 sizes; the human hipbelt fits human waist sizes 27 in. to 48 in. (68cm -123 cm). The Ruffwear Omnijore joring system features a removable girth strap, shock-absorbing towline with Talon Clip(TM) and color-coded ends that make it easy to attach.
short_description: The Ruffwear Omnijore joring system enables all-season dog-pulling activity, such as skijoring, mountainboard-joring, skatejoring, bikejoring or canicross.
